name: Gecko Adventures - Lost Relic
description:
Are you a keen adventurer? Is Indiana Jones your role model? Then this is absolutely the right game for you!

Help the gecko adventurer explore old temple ruins in this 2D pixel platformer and recover an ancient artefact from long forgotten times, that no gecko alive has ever seen before. Make your way through a lush jungle, dodge deadly traps and get ready to swing yourself over dangerous grounds with your tongue.

Good luck on your adventure!

Controls

The game can be played with keyboard as well as with controller.
(Menus may not be navigable vertically  with controller in WebGL due to unknown reasons)

Contributors
  • Aaron Kammer
  • Jenny Döring
  • Olga Molzan
  • Ulrike Katzschmann

This game was developed over three months within the project "Indiegame Development Lab II" at the Bauhaus-University Weimar in 2022.
More projects at: bauhausgamesfabrik.itch.io
